title: Project-Based Blended Learning for Reforming Electrical Control Training Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental principles of electrical control systems and industrial field experience
context.additional_context: Need to enhance practical electrical control technology competencies applicable to real-world tasks, based on managerial/leadership role experience

learning_goals: Learners can analyze electrical control project problems from real industrial settings and propose solutions.
Learners can enhance their ability to design and implement electrical control systems through step-by-step project processes.
Learners can collaborate with team members in blended learning environments to efficiently manage educational tools and components for electrical control.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
